title: Stable baseline (all mild)
description: All symptom entries at baseline; expected Green category.

title: Mild increase in shortness of breath
description: Slight exertional dyspnea, otherwise stable; expect Yellow.

title: Moderate SOB and mild edema
description: Both symptoms up one level; expect Orange.

title: Severe SOB and edema with hypotension
Improvement from prior severe to moderate
description: Shows recovery trend; expect one-category downgrade.

title: Weight gain only
description: No symptoms but 4 lb weight increase; expect Yellow.

title: BP omitted, all mild symptoms
description: Tests null handling for vitals; expect Green/Yellow boundary.

title: Tachycardia with mild SOB
description: Heart rate 110 with mild SOB; expect Orange.

title: Stable advanced baseline (NYHA III)
description: Persistent moderate symptoms but unchanged baseline; expect StableAdvanced.

title: Rapid improvement
description: All symptoms drop from moderate to none; expect Green.

title: Incomplete inputs (missing HR)
description: Algorithm must handle null safely; expect same category as if HR normal.

title: Worsening edema only
description: Moderate edema with no other change; expect Orange.

title: Severe symptoms with bradycardia
description: Edge case — HR 40, all symptoms severe; expect Red.
